name: Amalgama (villasenpai)
description:
Master the Four Elements ( Fire, Water,  Air and Earth ) to defend against different enemies.

A 2d defense survival game wherein you master and mix elements to create different projectiles to get rid of the different enemies.

*The build contains unity ads in test mode as this game is intended to be uploaded to the google playstore but still saving for the google's developers fee.

*If you think this game has potential please donate. If not, feel free to suggest thing to add or change.

Thank you!
